snippet: The Slav Epic, a massive 20-painting cycle depicting the history of the Slavic people by art nouveau master Alfons Mucha, is settling in for a two-year run at Prague's Trade Fair Palace.
abstract: The Slav Epic, a massive 20-painting cycle depicting the history of the Slavic people by art nouveau master Alfons Mucha, is settling in for a two-year run at Prague's Trade Fair Palace.

headline.main: Slavic History in Art  Hangs in Prague
